name: Into The Bunker (DaRove, Thomas J. Graham, adamcowie, bxaxkxa)
name_original: Into The Bunker (DaRove, Thomas J. Graham, adamcowie, bxaxkxa)
description:
Into The Bunker is a short puzzle game where you have stumbled upon an abandoned secret bunker in the middle of a forest. There are secrets waiting to be unlocked by completing the mysterious glyph symbols and decrypting the enigmas of the bunker!

This game was created in a weekend apart of CGX Grad Jam 2021 and is based on a dream I had the night before the game jam started; fitting the theme of "I must be dreaming"
